Columbia University, New york, NY Sep 2022 - Dec 2022
Biopharmaceutical Process Laboratory

• Conducted an Powdered X-Ray Diffraction (PXRD) analysis on crystals grown under 5 different conditions to assess its characteristics.
• Conducted a water permeability test and the desalination of water by employing the tangential filtration model with a 5k membrane.

Dwarkadas J. Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai, IN Jul 2021 - Apr 2022
Manufacturing of Sorbate and Sorbic Acid

worked on optimization of the process and modified the process thus increasing the flexibility of the process.

• Programming Language: Python (NumPy, Pandas).
• Simulation Softwares: Autodock, PyRx, Vega ZZ, Open Babel GUI, Avogadro, PyMOL, AlphaFold, Aspen (Hysys, EDR), Polymath, Sympy, Chemsep,
MATLAB, AutoCAD, Canva, Smartdraw.
LEADERSHIP AND ACTIVITIES

national-level celebrities.
• Completed the Bronze level of Duke of Edinburgh Awards.
